Sigmonecta Wróblewski, 1962: 176
( type species:
Micronecta quadristrigata Breddin, 1905
, by monotypy).

The subgenus
Sigmonecta
was established by Wróblewski (1962) for
Micronecta quadristrigata Breddin, 1905
. Subsequently, two more species have been placed in this subgenus:
M. altera Wróblewski, 1972
and
M. kymatista Nieser & Chen, 1999
(see
Chen et al. 2015
).
